title: Worlds Missions??? Only 1-3???
body: I've only had like 1-3 quests (honestly cannot remember). I only have 35 tokens.... So like.... do I HAVE to buy the ticket? Or are there going to be other chances to make more tokens? I have 1 mission right now that says to complete 4 other missions. But I don't have any other missions. :/ Help?

replies.body: There are free missions that will give you a limited amount of tokens, and new ones will appear with each week of Worlds.  You'll want to get a Missions pass if you're looking to get more tickets, though.

Hey there, I have the same "problem", I think you need to buy the pass, for people who dont have it like me and you I think those 3 are the only missions, still you can buy a key frag and some blue essence with the worlds tickets wich is not bad since blue essence will be multiplied by 6.5 when the ip update comes around.
